reviews.text:
Food was amazing ! 
And I enjoyed the drinks idk why my review has to be so long I jus wanna say the food is great
This was my second visit to TH. The service was very slow, dark meat chicken took nearly an hour to prepare, and it seemed everyone around was a little...
Well, the food here that my wife and I had was delicious. She got the fried chicken and fries and said the chicken made her feel like she was back in...
